Description:
Luxurious entertaining and spectacular views
In the bowl of a peaceful court, this young designer home occupies a landscaped allotment of 1,038 sq m approx. and offers breathtaking views.
Sprawling over 2 luxurious levels, the 5-star energy rated home comprises 4 robed bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 4 living rooms. An open study is at the front of the home, continuing past a carpeted lounge and culminating in a theatre/rumpus room.
Perfect for family entertaining, a spacious family room and dining area surround the elegant kitchen featuring Quantum Quartz waterfall benches, a stainless steel Blanco cooker and dishwasher, accompanied by a walk-in pantry. The dining area has bi-fold doors revealing the covered alfresco entertaining area, a deluxe heated spa and spectacular established gardens that attract local birdlife.
Enjoying spectacular views, the top floor features a carpeted retreat, the 4 spacious bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. An opulent master bedroom is a haven for parents, complete with a luxurious spa ensuite and fitted walk-in robe.
Some highlights of this extensively-appointed home include: powder room, zoned reverse cycle heating and cooling, surround sound capability, security alarm, 3-phase power, gas-boosted solar HWS, an oversized double auto garage with internal access and ample parking for a boat or caravan.
Walking distance from a playground, reserves, buses and Yarra Road Primary School, this exclusive family abode is close to Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College and Croydon Hills Primary School. Enjoy a range of nearby shopping centres including Croydon North, McAdam Square, Croydon Central, Chirnside Park and Eastland.
Also visit the stand alone website at: www.17jansoncourtcroydonnorth.com
